text.content: Customer has selected products/services and proceeds to checkout.

text.content: Customer has a valid card issued by Issuer Bank.

text.content: Merchant is integrated with Payment Gateway and Acquirer Bank.

text.content: Acquirer Bank credits Merchant’s account in settlement (typically next business day).

text.content: No funds deducted, or funds are immediately reversed if partial failure occurs.

text.content: (combined Authorization + Capture) and sends to Payment Gateway.

rich_text.plain_text: (combined Authorization + Capture) and sends to Payment Gateway.

text.content: Payment Gateway forwards request to Payment Processor.

rich_text.plain_text: Payment Gateway forwards request to Payment Processor.

text.content: Payment Processor routes request through Card Network.

rich_text.plain_text: Payment Processor routes request through Card Network.

text.content: Card Network passes request to Issuer Bank.

rich_text.plain_text: Card Network passes request to Issuer Bank.

text.content: Validates card authenticity and account status.

rich_text.plain_text: Validates card authenticity and account status.

text.content: Immediately captures funds (deducts from Customer’s account).

rich_text.plain_text: Immediately captures funds (deducts from Customer’s account).

text.content: Issuer Bank → Card Network → Payment Processor → Payment Gateway → Merchant.

rich_text.plain_text: Issuer Bank → Card Network → Payment Processor → Payment Gateway → Merchant.

text.content: Acquirer Bank receives settlement instructions and credits Merchant’s account (T+1, depending on scheme).

rich_text.plain_text: Acquirer Bank receives settlement instructions and credits Merchant’s account (T+1, depending on scheme).

text.content: Issuer approves only part of amount (e.g., prepaid card with limited balance).

text.content: After a temporary issue, Customer retries.

rich_text.plain_text: After a temporary issue, Customer retries.
